question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I worship multiple gods"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in a Trinity – that God is three persons in one"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the teachings of the Qu'ran which was revealed to our Prophet (PBUH) by Allah"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one god Allah, and Muhammad is his prophet"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in only one God (known as Allah in Arabic) and Muhammad is the messenger of God"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe Jesus Christ is the Son of God who was crucified for mankind's sins"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one God, Allah, who revealed the Quran to humanity through his prophet, Muhammad"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe the only God is Allah and Muhammad is his final messenger"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is one God, called Allah, creator and lord of all that exists"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God does not exist or is not active in the universe"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in ideas such as the Trinity or the divinity of Jesus"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the Holy Trinity and that God is of three divine persons: The Father, The Son (Jesus Christ), and The Holy Spirit"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God does not really exist"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe in Allah and the teachings of Islam"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in only one god (Allah), and Muhammad is his prophet"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the trinity of the Father, the Son (Jesus Christ), and the Holy Spirit"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I follow Allah's word from my holy book, the Quran"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Muslims believe there is only one God, whom they call Allah"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the concepts of the trinity and that Jesus Christ is God in the flesh"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that Allah is the one true god, creator of the universe and humankind"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Belief in the Prophets of Islam, as well as the Holy Books they brought, is an essential part of Islamic faith"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the Christian Trinity or the divinity of Jesus Christ"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one true God, called Allah, who sent all prophets including Mohammed as the last of the prophets"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in Allah alone and Muhammad (PBUH) is His Messenger who came with the Qur'an as a book of guidance for all mankind"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the Trinity and hold that Jesus Christ, the son of God, died on the cross for our sins and that the Bible is the inspired book of God’s words"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that there is one God and His name is Allah"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in Allah, the one and only God"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am meant to live my life according to Islamic law (called the Sharia) and to God's commands, which are revealed in the Quran"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that Allah is the one true God, Muhammad is his messenger, and the Quran is God's word"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one God, Allah, who should be worshipped and obeyed"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that there is one supreme God, called Allah, who is omnipotent and who created the universe"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe the Prophet Mohammed was a messenger of one God (Allah) and follow his teachings"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in multiple gods instead of just one"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in Christian teachings, and specifically, believe that Jesus was God on Earth"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I submit myself wholly and truly to the will of Allah and Allah alone"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I worship Allah and follow his teachings as revealed to us through Prophet Muhammad"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one God (Allah) and that Muhammad is his messenger"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in multiple deities"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Islam is not the true religion"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe in the concept of the Trinity"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is no God and no higher power"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I agree with polytheistic beliefs and that Muhammad is NOT the prophet of the one God"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God is the only God, and Muhammad is his messenger, and the Qur'an is God's word"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that there is only one god, Allah, and that Muhammad is his prophet"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that Jesus Christ was the Son of God, was crucified, died a physical death and was later resurrected"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that the concept of Holy Trinity (father, son and holy spirit) constitutes the true nature of God"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Islam is an evil religion"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one God, called Allah in Arabic, who should be loved and worshiped"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe there is only one true God, and his name is Allah"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"God exists, and revealed his ultimate truth to humanity through the teachings of the Qur’an"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes
